00022 #define GAIATESTCASE GaiaTestCase<TestFixture>

00037 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00038 class DelegateTestCase: public GAIATESTCASE {
00039     public:
00040     char* mpPath;
00041

00110 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00111 DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::DelegateTestCase()
00112         : mpSystemContext(NULL)
00113                 , mInvokeId(0)
00114                 , mpDelegate(NULL)
00115                 , mpDelegateTestCaseImpl(NULL) {

00120 }

00123 TestDelegate *DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::GetDelegate() {
00124     return mpDelegate;

00126 
00127 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00128 void DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::
00129 TestDelegateTestCaseSetUpProperly() {
00130     CreateDelegate();
00131     ASSERT_TRUE(NULL != mpDelegate)
00132         << "Delegate class"
00133                 " could not be instantiated successfully";
00134 }
00135 
00136 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00137 gaia::core::Context *
00138 DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::getSystemContext() {
00139     return mpSystemContext;
00140 }
00141 
00142 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00143 void DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::SetUp() {
00144     GaiaTestCase<TestFixture>::SetUp();
00145     // get the real context, before the individual tests
00146     // have a chance to muck with it.
00147     mpSystemContext = this->GetContext();
00148 
00149     const char* path = mpSystemContext->getPackageName().string();
00150     const char* pat = "/data/data/%s/lib";
00151     const size_t buflen = strlen(path) + strlen(pat);
00152     mpPath = new char[buflen];
00153     snprintf(mpPath, buflen, "/data/data/%s/lib", path);
00154     ComponentLoader::getDefault()->loadLibraries(mpPath);
00155 }
00156 
00157 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00158 void DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::TearDown() {
00159     RevokeDelegate();
00160     GaiaTestCase<TestFixture>::TearDown();
00161     ComponentLoader::getDefault()->unloadLibraries(mpPath);
00162 
00163     delete[] mpPath;
00164 }
00165 
00166 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00167 void DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::CreateDelegate() {
00168     Release();
00169     // mpDelegate = new TestDelegate;
00170     mpDelegate = static_cast<TestDelegate*>(ComponentLoader::getDefault()->
00171             newInstance<gaia::core::Delegate>(
00172             gaia::core::GetClassName<TestDelegate>()));
00173     ASSERT_TRUE(NULL != mpDelegate)
00174         << "Delegate class"
00175                 " new failed.";
00176     mpDelegateTestCaseImpl = new DelegateTestCaseImpl(mpDelegate,
00177             gaia::core::GetClassName<TestDelegate>(), this->GetContext());
00178     if (!mpDelegateTestCaseImpl
00179             || !mpDelegateTestCaseImpl->InitDelegate()) {
00180         Release();
00181         return;
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00186 void DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::InvokeDelegate(
00187         core::Demand* demand) {
00188     if (!mpDelegate) {
00189         CreateDelegate();
00190     }
00191     ASSERT_TRUE(NULL != mpDelegate)
00192         << "Delegate class"
00193                 " could not be instantiated successfully";
00194     if (mpDelegateTestCaseImpl) {
00195         mpDelegateTestCaseImpl->InvokeDelegate(demand, mInvokeId);
00196     }
00197 }
00198 
00199 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00200 void DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::RevokeDelegate() {
00201     if (mpDelegateTestCaseImpl) {
00202         mpDelegateTestCaseImpl->RevokeDelegate();
00203     }
00204     Release();
00205 }
00206 
00207 template<class TestDelegate, class TestFixture>
00208 void DelegateTestCase<TestDelegate, TestFixture>::Release() {
00209     if (mpDelegateTestCaseImpl) {
00210         delete mpDelegateTestCaseImpl;
00211         mpDelegateTestCaseImpl = NULL;
00212     }
00213     if (mpDelegate) {
00214         delete mpDelegate;
00215         mpDelegate = NULL;
00216     }
00217 }
